Description: Limestone ostracon with remains of 21 lines of text on the recto and 7 lines on the verso containing a letter with a request for landleasing.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Egypt Exploration Fund (probably from the excavation of 1910-11)
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (75-81, pls. 1 and 2)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82867) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82867)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II 1 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
